name: Metapod
flavorText:
This POKéMON is
vulnerable to
attack while its shell is soft,
exposing its weak
and tender body.

previous.name: Caterpie
previous.flavorText:
Its short feet are tipped with suction
pads that enable it to tirelessly climb
slopes and walls.

next.name: Butterfree
next.flavorText:
In battle, it
flaps its wings
at high speed to release highly
toxic dust into
the air.
